Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: First Crypto ETF to Establish DASH Masternode, Distribute Rewards as Dividends to Token Holders  First Crypto ETF, the world’s first exchange-traded fund for cryptocurrencies, will establish a Dash masternode and distribute the rewards earned through the masternode to First Crypto ETF token holders. The masternode system is unique to Dash coin. As the second tier of the Dash network, masternodes validate the blockchain and provide Dash users the ability to anonymize transactions. Masternodes are rewarded for their services with 45 percent of the mining fee generated by the creation of new blocks.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/first-crypto-etf-to-establish-dash-masternode/

Author: FirstCryptoETF
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens   http://www.firstcryptoetf.com   First Crypto ETF is to launch a pre-ICO before embarking on a full coin sale. This is the first ETF in the crypto-currency world, with First Crypto ETF be buying 10 crypto-currencies with high liquidity and daily trading volumes. First Crypto ETF’s portfolio will include Bitcoin, Ethereum and Litecoin as well as Zcash and Monero. Against this package, a token will be issued that can be traded on crypto-currency exchanges worldwide. Trading will also take place over peer-to-peer platforms, with day-to-day operations controlled by a unique technology – the Authorize Engine – running on proprietary hardware infrastructure and algorithms.  What will be First Crypto ETF? First Crypto ETF will be a type of fund that owns the underlying assets (crypto currencies) and divides ownership of those assets into tokens. Tokens will be tradable just like other coins on crypto exchanges or peer-to-peer platforms.   First Crypto ETF offers new possibilities for daily traders, beginners and portfolio managers alike. Active traders will experience a reduction in daily trading costs, and beginners and portfolio managers will be able to obtain an easier way to enter the crypto-currency market. In turn, this will provide liquidity to crypto-currency exchanges and boost daily trade volumes.  Secondary access will be provided using a unique product, named the Black Card, which can be purchased on First Crypto ETF’s website using a debit or credit card.  First Crypto ETF received a positive response to the completion of its first private round of sales. Now it is launching a pre-initial coin offering. This will be followed by an ICO. The tokens offered in these rounds are very attractive as First Crypto ETF provides a guarantee to hold regular buybacks once the platform is launched and introduced to the market. First Crypto ETF also offers a high level of transparency to the entire crypto community. Its operations will be audited by one of the big four accountancy firms – KPMG, Deloitte, EY or PwC.  What´s the simple idea of this project? Build infrastructure, network, technology and bring easy and simple traded token which represent the basket of selected crypto currencies. The buyer of token will own fractional piece of crypto currency basket. From crypto currencies in the basket is created file against which are issued tokens  in exact quantity and representing exact value. These tokens will be traded on crypto exchanges and can be bought on many others peer-to-peer markets or via BTC ATMs and also via www.firstcryptoetf.com web page.  Our token will be perfect for traders, newcomers and also portfolio managers. For everyone who looks for simple, clear solutions or for any reason that has no time to analyze markets or does not have a perfect knowledge of crypto markets but wants to be a part of this exciting community.  Let´s not forget that crypto world also attracts mainstream which is also our target audience.  BUSINESS MODEL  Right now, we´re in Jurassic period for ETF´s in crypto-currency world but… Income comes from management fees and commissions. Then it is arbitrage. Our platform has fantastic price discovery algos. And finally it is SaaS solution for our technology.   Authorize Engine  Authorize engine is a unique and cutting technology we integrated into our platform which helps us analyze markets and make smart decisions when and where to buy/sell exact amount of crypto currencies and how many tokens must be issued for market participants. It´s almost Artificial Intelligence in the world of trading. Authorize engine constantly analyze the entire time situation on the market – on all large crypto exchanges and data feeds from liquidity providers.  What is Black Card about? It´s Over-the-Counter (OTC) product. Let´s say you have no access to crypto Exchange. Black Card will be possible to buy by FIAT money, using credit or debit card on our web site. It will be issued with pre-define quantity of tokens, representing basket of crypto currencies and delivered with password and seed phrase respecting highest standards of security.   WHAT IS FCTF TOKEN ABOUT? FCTF token is issued by First Crypto ETF during pre-ICO and ICO process and represents our platform and solution. It is issued also for creating portfolio/basket of crypto currencies.  WHEN WILL FCTF TOKENS BE AVAILABLE FOR WITHDRAWAL? You would be able to withdrawal FCTF tokens ten days after  ICO.  IS IT TRUE THERE WILL BE TWO TOKENS? YES. FCTF token represents our platform, solution and also helps create portfolio of crypto currencies. This token has buyback guarantee.  Second token is  in ,,product category“ . It´s portfolio token and will be issued against basket of cryptocurrencies. Every trader, portfolio manager, newcomer or crypto enthusiast will buy this token. Portfolio token will be tradable like any other coins on exchanges, peer-to-peer platforms and by Black Card.  Pre-ICO starts on 6th October There will be hard cap on tokens in pre-ico. Hard cap is set at 10 000 000 and 8 200 000 tokens go for sale. That means 18% is kept for founders, consultants and service providers who were with us during pre-ico process.   1 FCTF token = 0,1 Euro  ICO Total tokens will be 55 000 000 and 45 100 000 goes for sale, using the same key as was used in pre-ICO.  1 FCTF token = 0,13 Euro  SOCIAL MEDIAS  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EIOSw6yvS_o https://twitter.com/FirstCryptoETF https://firstcryptoetf.slack.com https://t.me/firstcryptoetf

Author: FirstCryptoETF
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: Hi  First of all we don't say - buy and hold. We say let's go with us, we launch crypto ETF with unique trading technology. pre-ICO and ICO is for technology, building infrastructure - software, hardware, evangelistic campaign, OTC product development (Black Card) and for creating basket/portfolio of cryptos. and against this portfolio comes tradable token.  From the nature of ETF, it will be tradable on crypto exchanges on daily basis. 10 cryptos in basket as a 1 token what is good for daily traders, newcomers, anybody who can't analyse market everyday, wide public. but also for exchanges - it attracts more liquidity, brings higher volume.  Crypto20 seems more like index fund. Here's something about ETF vs Index Fund http://www.investopedia.com/articles/mutualfund/05/etfindexfund.asp

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: First Crypto ETF offers key ICO participants membership on Board of Director  First Crypto ETF has announced it will give key investors the chance to have a say in the company. Any investor or group of investors who control more than 1.000.000 tokens can nominate an individual to become a member of the Board of Directors.  “It´s a natural step towards greater transparency, giving pre-ICO and ICO participants the chance to control the company´s daily business and activities,” said First Crypto ETF Chief Executive Officer Peter Vrabel. First Crypto ETF said it would help ward against the experience of some ICOs, which saw projects raise money only to disappear soon after. “This kind of behaviour is unacceptable,” said Vrabel. “Investors should not be victims.”  The full article: https://coinidol.com/first-crypto-etf-offers-key-ico-participants-membership-on-board-of-director/

Author: FirstCryptoETF
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: price range will depend on the actual value of portfolio under First Crypto ETF. right now, in current conditions and prices on crypto exchanges we can say it will be around 100 euros per 1 portfolio token. we talk about 2nd token, tradable on the crypto exchanges, peer-to-peer platforms.

Author: FirstCryptoETF
Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
Body: Hi  All funds are securely held on cold wallet - powered by TREZOR. This amount will be used for creating portfolio/basket of cryptos. This portfolio will be sold to market participants - traders, newcomers, portfolio managers and by Black Card against 2nd token (not FCTF token. 2nd tradable on exchanges, peer-to-peer platforms...).  Value of portfolio = value of all 2nd tokens sold on the market. (here comes our Authorize engine which runs these operations. It issues 2nd token against file of cryptos and keeps price of token equal to value of portfolio)  So portfolio is done and sold. Everyone who bought 2nd token has a share from portfolio. Right? That being said means - First Crypto ETF will have income from portfolio management and arbitrage trading. But also will get funds for selling portfolio on the market against 2nd token. Buyback will be done from this income and money. So no doubt about buyback. Let´s not forget, whole operation will be under control of one of the big 4 accounitng firms (KPMG, PwC, Deloitte or EY). How it works can be found here www.youtube.com/watch?v=EIOSw6yvS_o It may sounds strange and complicated at first sight. But when you take a closer look at it, it´s very logical and makes perfect sense.

Title: [ANN][ICO] First Crypto ETF launches a pre-ICO, guarantees to buyback tokens
